channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock futures trim losses as oil prices moderate following U.S. strike on Iran
Crude-oil futures have lost of all their gains from the U.S. attack on Iran
S&P 500 futures on cusp of turning positive as European stock markets open
Iran’s parliament backs blocking Strait of Hormuz. Its closure will alienate Tehran further
item.description: The Straits are the only sea route from the Persian Gulf to the open ocean, and about 20% of the world's oil transits the waterway.

item.title: World leaders react after Trump says U.S. has bombed 3 nuclear sites in Iran, including Fordo

item.title: How the Israel-Iran standoff took a turn and what's next after a pivotal 24 hours
item.description: Iran's response will be watched by the rest of the world, especially among oil traders.

item.title: NATO allies pledge to hike defense spending – but will they deliver?

item.title: Trump calls 'obliteration' an accurate description of damage to Iran's nuclear facilities
item.description: Trump on Sunday disputed Iranian attempts to downplay the strikes on its nuclear facilities, stressing that "obliteration" was an accurate description...

item.title: Dow futures down just 230 points as oil futures jump after U.S. bombs Iran
